# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #61](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#61)

#### [TheFinisher4EverÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fp8f8)

Are all wind spren really just unbonded honor spren?

#### Brandon Sanderson

No, they are cousins to one another, but not exactly the same thing.
